intro: Psychotria xanthophylloides, commonly known as the yellow-leaf psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its glossy, elliptical leaves that are typically yellow-green in color. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Psychotria xanthophylloides is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
